data.title: HELP:song in kill bill scene
data.text:
NPG2045

I believe that's Don't Let Me Be Misunderstood by Santa Esmeralda it actually has vocals but they only play the instrumental part, the song's 10 1/2 min long.

brownsugar said:

Does anybody know what instrumental is playing in the close to the last kill bill scene kill bill 1 scene when Uma thurman begans to fight lucy liu? anybody please

Raze

NPG2045 said:

I believe that's Don't Let Me Be Misunderstood by Santa Esmeralda it actually has vocals but they only play the instrumental part, the song's 10 1/2 min long.

brownsugar said:

Does anybody know what instrumental is playing in the close to the last kill bill scene kill bill 1 scene when Uma thurman begans to fight lucy liu? anybody please

i've always wondered about that too! but too lazy to look up the soundtrack credits

LOVE that song. thanks for the info

"Half of what I say is meaningless; but I say it so that the other half may reach you." - Kahlil Gibran

MikeMatronik

peppeken said:

it is called 'the lost shepherd. by james last...it is on the soundtrack cd....beautiful track and fits so well with the movie

CORRECTION:

Actually the song is called "The Lonely Shepherd"...it's a James Last composition and it's done by george zamfir.

[Edited 7/3/07 16:54pm]
